Workshops

We are hoping to run a number of hands-on workshops the day before the main conference. Access will be available to those who have a conference ticket. The intention is to give people experience building serverless applications supported by experts. If you or your organisation are interested in running a workshop, please get in touch at cardiff@serverlessdays.io
